Message:
Every entry afterwards was
all about that woman.

“We’re going out on
a date next week.”

It looks like they had
a truly wonderful wedding,
surrounded by countless blooms
of their favorite flower.

“From this day forth,
we’re going to grow
our precious flower.”

With that entry,
the diary came to an end.

So, Mom and Dad met here,
at the mansion.

I wonder what kind of flower
brought them together.

Since they both loved it,
I’m sure it’s a wonderful flower.

I sure want to see it.
Maybe, if I search the garden,
I can find it there.
